name: Aren't You Special
description: Do you have what it takes to be a Vault overseer? Are you... S.P.E.C.I.A.L.? This story-based adventure for the Fallout 4 game was created using the Twine engine as a prototype for an adventure mod I hope to build using the Fallout 4 Creation Kit. It's a complete adventure with several dark twists, challenging tests and multiple endings. Think you're in the top 5% of all Candidates? Give this Vault a run through, and find out!
